sub_fields.label: Sidebar
sub_fields.name: sidebar_display
sub_fields.instructions: Show / hide sidebar for this section.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: section_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Use &#60strong&#62 tag for the words with strong importance.

sub_fields.label: Subheading
sub_fields.name: section_subheading
sub_fields.instructions: Tip: subheadings should be relatively short.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: section_text
sub_fields.instructions:
Article body text

Use <b> tag to stylistically offset text. Use <em> for stress emphasis, i.e., something you’d pronounce differently.

sub_fields.label: Sidebar content
sub_fields.name: section_sidebar
sub_fields.instructions: Sidebar can contain more than one object, but make sure sidebar content does not exceed main content height.

sub_fields.label: YouTube Video
sub_fields.name: sidebar_youtube_video
sub_fields.instructions: Enter YouTube video ID. Copy part that follows after: "http://youtu.be/". E.g. "9D05ej8u-gU".
